name: Stunt Kite Masters VR
description: Carve up the sky in the most realistic virtual reality kite experience ever!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 or later Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1200 MB available space
